test.name: 001 Create FHIR Bundles

kw.name: fhirbridge.load test cases from json
kw.msg: No keyword with name 'fhirbridge.load test cases from json' found.
kw.status: No keyword with name 'fhirbridge.load test cases from json' found.

kw.name: Log
kw.msg: All FHIR Bundles and OpenEHR AQLs validated.
kw.arg: All FHIR Bundles and OpenEHR AQLs validated.
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

test.doc:
1. *LOAD* all the test cases from test_case_list.json file
2. *RUN* all the test cases for each bundle in a loop.
3. *CREATE* new EHR record
4. *CREATE* FHIR bundle json and post it to FHIR server
5. *VALIDATE* the FHIR response status
6. *CREATE* openEHR AQL and post it to openEHR server
7. *VALIDATE* the content of the AQL response.
test.status: Setup failed: No keyword with name 'fhirbridge.load test cases from json' found.
